name: SweetSpices (Visual Novel)
description:
"Heya! How's your day? Oh... It's been weird lately huh? Yeah, it's always a bummer when everything is not what it seems or... it isn't up to your expectation. But don't cha worry, it's called life, a story that is everchanging where everyone has their own glorious chapters and darkest hour. The pacing is sometimes as fast as the season finale and sometimes as low as the filler episode. What you hafta do is... just need to keep reading, no matter how good or bad the paragraph is. Eventually... you will realize that this is all just a sweet story.... with a bit of spices" 

Sweet Spices is a linear visual novel with some degree of choices. Setting up in  urban fantasy settings, you follow the story of a brown rabbit from countryside trying to live in the big city of Ailurpine while living in his cousin cafe. However,  as usual, sometimes life is not what it seems...

This VN is written and drawn by me, follow my Twitter if you are interested in my art and memes. The music is composed by JoshuaStLee, check his Youtube channel to see more of his amazing work!!

Note : This game is under development.
